title: Did the White House ask the Navy to keep Prince John S. McCain "out of sight " in order to visit Trump?
subtitle: A wave of news reports provoked controversy following President Donald Trump ' s speech on the occasion of the Pacific Forces Memorial Day.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In the spring of 2019, the White House asked United States Navy and Air Force officials to ensure that John McCain, or his name, was not visible during the speech of United States President Donald Trump in Japan on 27 May.
